headline.main: FREIGHT FORWARDERS ACT ON LEASE-LEND; Special Committee Named to Meet With Stettinius

lead_paragraph: Appointment of a special committee to meet with Lease-Lend Administrator Edward R. Stettinius Jr., to discuss the problem of foregin freight forwarders who feel they are being adversely affected by present procedure under the act, was announced yesterday by T.E. Reeve, of the New York Foreign Freight Forwarders and Brokers Association.
abstract: Apptd to lend-lease freight forwarding com

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: FREIGHT FORWARDERS AND BROKERS ASSN, FOREIGN
